hadiths.text: It was narrated from Amr bin Shu'aib, from his father, from, his Grandfather, that the Prophet (ﷺ) of Allah (SWT) said:“None of you should take back his gift, except a father (taking it back) from his son.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَعْطَى وَلَدَهُ ثُمَّ رَجَعَ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: One Who Gives His Child A Gift Then Takes It Back
